channel.desc: An encoded ID that represents a channel, private group, or DM.

ts.desc: The timestamp of the streaming message.

markdown_text.desc: Accepts message text formatted in markdown. Limit this field to 12,000 characters.

blocks.desc: A list of blocks that will be rendered at the bottom of the finalized message.

metadata.desc: JSON object with event_type and event_payload fields, presented as a URL-encoded string. Metadata you post to Slack is accessible to any app or user who is a member of that workspace.
